channel.title: ngrok on QWxlea
channel.description: Recent content in ngrok on QWxlea

item.title: hugo and ngrok, for fun and profit
item.description: Hugo is able to quickly update a site, and makes improving and bug-fixing very simple. Showing your work-in-progress online is not as simple, and probably not what you want, anyway. Comes in ngrok. ngrok allows you to expose a web server running on your local machine to the internet. Just tell ngrok what port your web server is listening on. Installation is simple, just download from here, and put in your path.
